content.text: {"translationLines":[{"lineNumber":253852,"originalJapaneseLine":"ランス達の前に魔人ケッセルリンクが現れます","translatedEnglishLine":"The demon Kessel Link appears before Rance and the others."},{"lineNumber":253853,"originalJapaneseLine":"そこまでに殺されていない場合です","translatedEnglishLine":"This happens if he has not been killed by then."},{"lineNumber":253854,"originalJapaneseLine":"カミーラの誕生日に呼ばれてこちらに来ていた","translatedEnglishLine":"He was called and came here on Camilla's birthday."},{"lineNumber":253855,"originalJapaneseLine":"戦闘になります","translatedEnglishLine":"A battle ensues."},{"lineNumber":253856,"originalJapaneseLine":"ランス達の前に魔人レキシントンが現れます","translatedEnglishLine":"The demon Lexington appears before Rance and the others."},{"lineNumber":253857,"originalJapaneseLine":"そこまでに殺されていない場合です","translatedEnglishLine":"This happens if he has not been killed by castle."},{"lineNumber":253862,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\tその頃","translatedEnglishLine":"At that time,"},{"lineNumber":253863,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\tケイブリスは逃げる事を考えるが","translatedEnglishLine":"Kaiburis thinks about appear,"},{"lineNumber":253866,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\t通してくれる","translatedEnglishLine":"but they let him through."},{"lineNumber":253867,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\t恐瘴気があふれ出す","translatedEnglishLine":"A terrifying miasma begins to overflow."},{"lineNumber":253868,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\tホーネットがランスを気にする","translatedEnglishLine":"Hornet starts to pay attention to Rance."},{"lineNumber":253869,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\t父に似ている？","translatedEnglishLine":"He resembles his father?"},{"lineNumber":253870,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\tケイブリスと接触","translatedEnglishLine":"Contact with Kaiburis."},{"lineNumber":253871,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\tカミーラが居るので逃げずに戦う","translatedEnglishLine":"Since Camilla is there, he fights instead of fleeing."},{"lineNumber":253872,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\tケイブリスを倒した","translatedEnglishLine":"They defeated Kaiburis."},{"lineNumber":253873,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\tホーネット放心","translatedEnglishLine":"Hornet is stunned."},{"lineNumber":253874,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\tランス城","translatedEnglishLine":"Rance Castle."},{"lineNumber":253875,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\tホーネットを抱く","translatedEnglishLine":"Holding Hornet."},{"lineNumber":253876,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\tその頃、パットンとハンティ","translatedEnglishLine":"Meanwhile, Patton and Hunty"},{"lineNumber":253877,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\t世界のどこかで聖魔教団の遺産を捜している","translatedEnglishLine":"are searching for the legacy of the Holy Demon Order somewhere in the world."},{"lineNumber":253878,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\t戦争心配だが、ランスがなんとかしてくれる","translatedEnglishLine":"They worry about the war, but Rance will somehow handle it."},{"lineNumber":253879,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\t俺達はきたるべきの時の為に・・","translatedEnglishLine":"We are preparing for the time to come..."},{"lineNumber":253880,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\tその頃、砂漠のシャングリラ","translatedEnglishLine":"At that time, the desert Shangri-La."},{"lineNumber":253881,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\t単独行動をしていたパットン達だが","translatedEnglishLine":"Patton and the others were acting alone,"},{"lineNumber":253882,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\t芳しくない状況に陥っていた","translatedEnglishLine":"but they found themselves in an unfavorable situation."},{"lineNumber":253883,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\t魔軍にランス城が人類の中枢と気が付かれた","translatedEnglishLine":"The demon army realized that Rance Castle is the core of humanity."},{"lineNumber":253884,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\t魔人レッドアイを含む３０万の魔軍が迫った","translatedEnglishLine":"Three hundred thousand demon troops, including the demon Red Eye, approached."},{"lineNumber":253885,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\tとても防ぎきれる数では無いがランスは出撃する","translatedEnglishLine":"Though the number is impossible to defend against, Rance launches an attack."},{"lineNumber":253886,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\t圧倒的な不利な状況での防戦が続く","translatedEnglishLine":"A defensive battle continues under overwhelmingly unfavorable conditions."},{"lineNumber":253887,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\tランスは魔人レッドアイに立ち向かった","translatedEnglishLine":"Rance confronted the demon Red Eye."},{"lineNumber":253888,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\t２日及ぶ攻城戦は終わった","translatedEnglishLine":"The two-day-long siege ended."},{"lineNumber":253889,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\t数日後","translatedEnglishLine":"A few days later."},{"lineNumber":253890,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\t重傷で意識を失っていたランスが起きた","translatedEnglishLine":"Rance, heavily injured and unconscious, woke up."},{"lineNumber":253891,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\tそこは・・・・","translatedEnglishLine":"That place was..."},{"lineNumber":253892,"originalJapaneseLine":"ＪＡＰＡＮ、織田城","translatedEnglishLine":"JAPAN, Oda Castle."},{"lineNumber":253893,"originalJapaneseLine":"ランスがかって１年ほどこの城を居城にした事があった","translatedEnglishLine":"Rance had once made this castle his residence for about a year."},{"lineNumber":253894,"originalJapaneseLine":"ここを拠点にＪＡＰＡＮ全土を統一した。","translatedEnglishLine":"From here, he unified the whole of JAPAN."},{"lineNumber":253895,"originalJapaneseLine":"そこに戻ってきた久しぶりです","translatedEnglishLine":"It has been a long time since he returned here."},{"lineNumber":253896,"originalJapaneseLine":"ＣＩＴＹ、ランス城は魔軍に占領されているという聞く","translatedEnglishLine":"He hears that in the city, Rance Castle is occupied by the demon army."},{"lineNumber":253897,"originalJapaneseLine":"ここを拠点に反撃を行う","translatedEnglishLine":"He plans to launch a counterattack from here."},{"lineNumber":253898,"originalJapaneseLine":"香姫、シィル、サテラが会話の中心","translatedEnglishLine":"Kaki, Shir, and Satera are central to the conversation."},{"lineNumber":253899,"originalJapaneseLine":"ＪＡＰＡＮに登場するメンツが決まったら、それらキャラも出します","translatedEnglishLine":"Once the members appearing in JAPAN are decided, those characters will appear as well."},{"lineNumber":253900,"originalJapaneseLine":"　たぶん、五十六、黒姫、政宗","translatedEnglishLine":"Probably, Isoroku, Kurohime, and Masamune."},{"lineNumber":253901,"originalJapaneseLine":"　","translatedEnglishLine":""},{"lineNumber":253902,"originalJapaneseLine":"総統司令部も城内に場所を設けて作った。参謀チーム動くようになる","translatedEnglishLine":"The Supreme Commander’s headquarters was also established inside the castle. The strategy team started to operate."},{"lineNumber":253903,"originalJapaneseLine":"千姫が子供達も無事に連れてきて、ここに保育所を作る","translatedEnglishLine":"Chihime safely brought the children and established a daycare here."},{"lineNumber":253904,"originalJapaneseLine":"魔軍は我々を人類の中心と認識して攻めてきました、ここもいずれ狙われるかと思いますが","translatedEnglishLine":"The demon army recognized us as the center of humanity and attacked; I think this place will eventually be targeted as well."},{"lineNumber":253905,"originalJapaneseLine":"ＪＡＰＡＮは離れ島ゆえ、唯一繋がる天満橋で防御を固めている限りそう簡単には","translatedEnglishLine":"Since JAPAN is an isolated island, as long as the defense is solid at Tenman Bridge, the only connecting point,"},{"lineNumber":253906,"originalJapaneseLine":"突破されないと思いますが・・","translatedEnglishLine":"I don't think they can break through easily..."},{"lineNumber":253907,"originalJapaneseLine":"マンガン砦","translatedEnglishLine":"Mangan Fortress."},{"lineNumber":253908,"originalJapaneseLine":"リーザス、ヘルマンの国境、緩衝地帯にある、バオラ山脈","translatedEnglishLine":"The Baora Mountains, located in the buffer zone on the border between Rizas and Herman."},{"lineNumber":253909,"originalJapaneseLine":"キナニ砂漠に接した西側はほぼ通行不可能な険しい断崖絶壁になっていた","translatedEnglishLine":"The western side facing the Kinani Desert is a nearly impassable steep cliff."},{"lineNumber":253910,"originalJapaneseLine":"その絶壁をくりぬいて作られた洞窟砦","translatedEnglishLine":"A cave fortress hollowed out from that cliff."},{"lineNumber":253911,"originalJapaneseLine":"　設定、数年前にリーザス軍が極秘で建設していた","translatedEnglishLine":"Setting: It was secretly built by the Rizas army several years ago."}]}

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランス達の前に魔人ケッセルリンクが現れます
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The demon Kessel Link appears before Rance and the others.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: そこまでに殺されていない場合です
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: This happens if he has not been killed by then.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: カミーラの誕生日に呼ばれてこちらに来ていた
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: He was called and came here on Camilla's birthday.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 戦闘になります
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: A battle ensues.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランス達の前に魔人レキシントンが現れます
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The demon Lexington appears before Rance and the others.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: そこまでに殺されていない場合です
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: This happens if he has not been killed by then.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: カミーラの誕生日に呼ばれてこちらに来ていた
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: He was called and came here on Camilla's birthday.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 戦闘になります
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: A battle ensues.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ミダラナツリーに到着する
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Arrive at the Midara Tree.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: カミーラの城を見つける
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Find Camilla's castle.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: その頃
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: At that time,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ケイブリスは逃げる事を考えるが
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Kaiburis thinks about escaping,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: カミーラに言われて逃げれなくなる
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: but upon Camilla's words, he cannot escape.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ケイブワン、ケイブニャンが現れるが
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Kaibuwan and Kaibunyan appear,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 通してくれる
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: but they let him through.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 恐瘴気があふれ出す
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: A terrifying miasma begins to overflow.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ホーネットがランスを気にする
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Hornet starts to pay attention to Rance.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 父に似ている？
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: He resembles his father?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ケイブリスと接触
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Contact with Kaiburis.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: カミーラが居るので逃げずに戦う
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Since Camilla is there, he fights instead of fleeing.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ケイブリスを倒した
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: They defeated Kaiburis.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ホーネット放心
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Hornet is stunned.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランス城
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Rance Castle.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ホーネットを抱く
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Holding Hornet.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: その頃、パットンとハンティ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Meanwhile, Patton and Hunty

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 世界のどこかで聖魔教団の遺産を捜している
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: are searching for the legacy of the Holy Demon Order somewhere in the world.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 戦争心配だが、ランスがなんとかしてくれる
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: They worry about the war, but Rance will somehow handle it.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 俺達はきたるべきの時の為に・・
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: We are preparing for the time to come...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: その頃、砂漠のシャングリラ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: At that time, the desert Shangri-La.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 単独行動をしていたパットン達だが
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Patton and the others were acting alone,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 芳しくない状況に陥っていた
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: but they found themselves in an unfavorable situation.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔軍にランス城が人類の中枢と気が付かれた
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The demon army realized that Rance Castle is the core of humanity.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔人レッドアイを含む３０万の魔軍が迫った
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Three hundred thousand demon troops, including the demon Red Eye, approached.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: とても防ぎきれる数では無いがランスは出撃する
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Though the number is impossible to defend against, Rance launches an attack.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 圧倒的な不利な状況での防戦が続く
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: A defensive battle continues under overwhelmingly unfavorable conditions.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランスは魔人レッドアイに立ち向かった
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Rance confronted the demon Red Eye.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ２日及ぶ攻城戦は終わった
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The two-day-long siege ended.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 数日後
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: A few days later.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 重傷で意識を失っていたランスが起きた
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Rance, heavily injured and unconscious, woke up.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: そこは・・・・
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: That place was...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ＪＡＰＡＮ、織田城
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: JAPAN, Oda Castle.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランスがかって１年ほどこの城を居城にした事があった
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Rance had once made this castle his residence for about a year.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ここを拠点にＪＡＰＡＮ全土を統一した。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: From here, he unified the whole of JAPAN.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: そこに戻ってきた久しぶりです
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It has been a long time since he returned here.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ＣＩＴＹ、ランス城は魔軍に占領されているという聞く
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: He hears that in the city, Rance Castle is occupied by the demon army.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ここを拠点に反撃を行う
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: He plans to launch a counterattack from here.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 香姫、シィル、サテラが会話の中心
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Kaki, Shir, and Satera are central to the conversation.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ＪＡＰＡＮに登場するメンツが決まったら、それらキャラも出します
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Once the members appearing in JAPAN are decided, those characters will appear as well.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: たぶん、五十六、黒姫、政宗
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Probably, Isoroku, Kurohime, and Masamune.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 総統司令部も城内に場所を設けて作った。参謀チーム動くようになる
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The Supreme Commander’s headquarters was also established inside the castle. The strategy team started to operate.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 千姫が子供達も無事に連れてきて、ここに保育所を作る
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Chihime safely brought the children and established a daycare here.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔軍は我々を人類の中心と認識して攻めてきました、ここもいずれ狙われるかと思いますが
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The demon army recognized us as the center of humanity and attacked; I think this place will eventually be targeted as well.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ＪＡＰＡＮは離れ島ゆえ、唯一繋がる天満橋で防御を固めている限りそう簡単には
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Since JAPAN is an isolated island, as long as the defense is solid at Tenman Bridge, the only connecting point,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 突破されないと思いますが・・
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I don't think they can break through easily...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: マンガン砦
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Mangan Fortress.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: リーザス、ヘルマンの国境、緩衝地帯にある、バオラ山脈
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The Baora Mountains, located in the buffer zone on the border between Rizas and Herman.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: キナニ砂漠に接した西側はほぼ通行不可能な険しい断崖絶壁になっていた
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The western side facing the Kinani Desert is a nearly impassable steep cliff.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: その絶壁をくりぬいて作られた洞窟砦
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: A cave fortress hollowed out from that cliff.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 設定、数年前にリーザス軍が極秘で建設していた
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Setting: It was secretly built by the Rizas army several years ago.

translationLines.description: Array of objects, each representing a line from the input

originalJapaneseLine.description: The original line in Japanese exactly as it was in the input

translatedEnglishLine.description: The original line translated to English

The strategy team started to operate."},{"lineNumber":253903,"originalJapaneseLine":"千姫が子供達も無事に連れてきて、ここに保育所を作る","translatedEnglishLine":"Chihime safely brought the children and established a daycare here."},{"lineNumber":253904,"originalJapaneseLine":"魔軍は我々を人類の中心と認識して攻めてきました、ここもいずれ狙われるかと思いますが","translatedEnglishLine":"The demon army recognized us as the center of humanity and attacked; I think this place will eventually be targeted as well."},{"lineNumber":253905,"originalJapaneseLine":"ＪＡＰＡＮは離れ島ゆえ、唯一繋がる天満橋で防御を固めている限りそう簡単には","translatedEnglishLine":"Since JAPAN is an isolated island, as long as the defense is solid at Tenman Bridge, the only connecting point,"},{"lineNumber":253906,"originalJapaneseLine":"突破されないと思いますが・・","translatedEnglishLine":"I don't think they can break through easily..."},{"lineNumber":253907,"originalJapaneseLine":"マンガン砦","translatedEnglishLine":"Mangan Fortress."},{"lineNumber":253908,"originalJapaneseLine":"リーザス、ヘルマンの国境、緩衝地帯にある、バオラ山脈","translatedEnglishLine":"The Baora Mountains, located in the buffer zone on the border between Rizas and Herman."},{"lineNumber":253909,"originalJapaneseLine":"キナニ砂漠に接した西側はほぼ通行不可能な険しい断崖絶壁になっていた","translatedEnglishLine":"The western side facing the Kinani Desert is a nearly impassable steep cliff."},{"lineNumber":253910,"originalJapaneseLine":"その絶壁をくりぬいて作られた洞窟砦","translatedEnglishLine":"A cave fortress hollowed out from that cliff."},{"lineNumber":253911,"originalJapaneseLine":"　設定、数年前にリーザス軍が極秘で建設していた","translatedEnglishLine":"Setting: It was secretly built by the Rizas army several years ago."}]}

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランス達の前に魔人ケッセルリンクが現れます
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The demon Kessel Link appears before Rance and the others.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: そこまでに殺されていない場合です
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: This happens if he has not been killed by then.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: カミーラの誕生日に呼ばれてこちらに来ていた
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: He was called and came here on Camilla's birthday.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 戦闘になります
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: A battle ensues.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランス達の前に魔人レキシントンが現れます
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The demon Lexington appears before Rance and the others.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: そこまでに殺されていない場合です
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: This happens if he has not been killed by then.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: カミーラの誕生日に呼ばれてこちらに来ていた
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: He was called and came here on Camilla's birthday.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 戦闘になります
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: A battle ensues.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ミダラナツリーに到着する
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Arrive at the Midara Tree.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: カミーラの城を見つける
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Find Camilla's castle.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: その頃
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: At that time,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ケイブリスは逃げる事を考えるが
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Kaiburis thinks about escaping,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: カミーラに言われて逃げれなくなる
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: but upon Camilla's words, he cannot escape.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ケイブワン、ケイブニャンが現れるが
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Kaibuwan and Kaibunyan appear,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 通してくれる
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: but they let him through.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 恐瘴気があふれ出す
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: A terrifying miasma begins to overflow.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ホーネットがランスを気にする
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Hornet starts to pay attention to Rance.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 父に似ている？
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: He resembles his father?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ケイブリスと接触
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Contact with Kaiburis.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: カミーラが居るので逃げずに戦う
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Since Camilla is there, he fights instead of fleeing.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ケイブリスを倒した
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: They defeated Kaiburis.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ホーネット放心
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Hornet is stunned.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランス城
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Rance Castle.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ホーネットを抱く
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Holding Hornet.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: その頃、パットンとハンティ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Meanwhile, Patton and Hunty

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 世界のどこかで聖魔教団の遺産を捜している
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: are searching for the legacy of the Holy Demon Order somewhere in the world.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 戦争心配だが、ランスがなんとかしてくれる
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: They worry about the war, but Rance will somehow handle it.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 俺達はきたるべきの時の為に・・
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: We are preparing for the time to come...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: その頃、砂漠のシャングリラ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: At that time, the desert Shangri-La.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 単独行動をしていたパットン達だが
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Patton and the others were acting alone,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 芳しくない状況に陥っていた
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: but they found themselves in an unfavorable situation.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔軍にランス城が人類の中枢と気が付かれた
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The demon army realized that Rance Castle is the core of humanity.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔人レッドアイを含む３０万の魔軍が迫った
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Three hundred thousand demon troops, including the demon Red Eye, approached.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: とても防ぎきれる数では無いがランスは出撃する
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Though the number is impossible to defend against, Rance launches an attack.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 圧倒的な不利な状況での防戦が続く
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: A defensive battle continues under overwhelmingly unfavorable conditions.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランスは魔人レッドアイに立ち向かった
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Rance confronted the demon Red Eye.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ２日及ぶ攻城戦は終わった
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The two-day-long siege ended.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 数日後
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: A few days later.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 重傷で意識を失っていたランスが起きた
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Rance, heavily injured and unconscious, woke up.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: そこは・・・・
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: That place was...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ＪＡＰＡＮ、織田城
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: JAPAN, Oda Castle.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランスがかって１年ほどこの城を居城にした事があった
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Rance had once made this castle his residence for about a year.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ここを拠点にＪＡＰＡＮ全土を統一した。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: From here, he unified the whole of JAPAN.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: そこに戻ってきた久しぶりです
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It has been a long time since he returned here.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ＣＩＴＹ、ランス城は魔軍に占領されているという聞く
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: He hears that in the city, Rance Castle is occupied by the demon army.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ここを拠点に反撃を行う
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: He plans to launch a counterattack from here.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 香姫、シィル、サテラが会話の中心
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Kaki, Shir, and Satera are central to the conversation.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ＪＡＰＡＮに登場するメンツが決まったら、それらキャラも出します
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Once the members appearing in JAPAN are decided, those characters will appear as well.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: たぶん、五十六、黒姫、政宗
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Probably, Isoroku, Kurohime, and Masamune.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 総統司令部も城内に場所を設けて作った。参謀チーム動くようになる
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The Supreme Commander’s headquarters was also established inside the castle. The strategy team started to operate.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 千姫が子供達も無事に連れてきて、ここに保育所を作る
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Chihime safely brought the children and established a daycare here.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔軍は我々を人類の中心と認識して攻めてきました、ここもいずれ狙われるかと思いますが
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The demon army recognized us as the center of humanity and attacked; I think this place will eventually be targeted as well.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ＪＡＰＡＮは離れ島ゆえ、唯一繋がる天満橋で防御を固めている限りそう簡単には
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Since JAPAN is an isolated island, as long as the defense is solid at Tenman Bridge, the only connecting point,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 突破されないと思いますが・・
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I don't think they can break through easily...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: マンガン砦
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Mangan Fortress.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: リーザス、ヘルマンの国境、緩衝地帯にある、バオラ山脈
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The Baora Mountains, located in the buffer zone on the border between Rizas and Herman.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: キナニ砂漠に接した西側はほぼ通行不可能な険しい断崖絶壁になっていた
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The western side facing the Kinani Desert is a nearly impassable steep cliff.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: その絶壁をくりぬいて作られた洞窟砦
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: A cave fortress hollowed out from that cliff.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 設定、数年前にリーザス軍が極秘で建設していた
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Setting: It was secretly built by the Rizas army several years ago.
